PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionPortPHistoryCable
PropertySetDef.Definition: Log of electrical activity attached to an instance of IfcPerformanceHistory having an assigned IfcDistributionPort of type CABLE.

PropertyDef.Name: Current
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual current and operable range.

PropertyDef.Name: Voltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual voltage and operable range.

PropertyDef.Name: PowerFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio between the rated electrical power and the product of the rated current and rated voltage

PropertyDef.Name: DataTransmitted
PropertyDef.Definition: For data ports, captures log of data transmitted. The LIST at IfcTimeSeriesValue.Values may split out data according to Pset_DistributionPortTypeCable.Protocols.

PropertyDef.Name: DataReceived
PropertyDef.Definition: For data ports, captures log of data received. The LIST at IfcTimeSeriesValue.Values may split out data according to Pset_DistributionPortTypeCable.Protocols.
